Text: FW Follow up on TNPC meeting Cc This meeting will be held in I have asked Amy Tian to ask her accountants where this book basis has been transferred Any information on this point would be helpful Patty Original Message From Lee Patricia A Sent Fri PM To Cc Lee Patricia A Subject Follow up on TNPC meeting We had agreed to get together on Tuesday to finish our discussion on the TNPC wanrrants and the unwind of the Raptor structure I am suggesting that we get together on Tuesday morning at Please let me know if that works for everyone Outstanding issues How will the FAS transactions related to the warrants unwind on EES Have they been unwound as part of the September writedown Do the deferred taxes on Raptor after the September entries relate to the basis in the warrants transferred out of Raptor million Where did this amount get transferred What are the deferred taxes that remain on the books of the Raptor entities after September Any other topics Anne can you reserve EB at on Tuesday morning for us Thanks Patty

Follow up on TNPC meeting Cc We had agreed to get together on Tuesday to finish our discussion on the TNPC wanrrants and the unwind of the Raptor structure I am suggesting that we get together on Tuesday morning at Please let me know if that works for everyone Outstanding issues How will the FAS transactions related to the warrants unwind on EES Have they been unwound as part of the September writedown Do the deferred taxes on Raptor after the September entries relate to the basis in the warrants transferred out of Raptor million Where did this amount get transferred What are the deferred taxes that remain on the books of the Raptor entities after September Any other topics Anne can you reserve EB at on Tuesday morning for us Thanks Patty

RE Sales Tax Payable accrual Cc I think we have found the account but it looks like this has been transferred to from Can you provide us with the entries for both companies and let me know when you plan on taking this to the income statement if you plan on doing this Thanks Patty Original Message From Ray Sara Sent Wednesday October PM To Hunter Todd Cc Lee Patricia A Subject Sales Tax Payable accrual Todd Can you please provide Patty with the company and account number where the yearend sales tax accrual is recorded They are going to start making payments against the accrual Is the balance still at the original MM

RE Sales Tax Payable accrualPlease get together and make sure that the deferred taxes are moved to the correct entities reflecting where the reserves are Patty Original Message From Hunter Todd Sent Friday October PM To Lee Patricia A Cc Ray Sara Richards Todd Seelig Sally Husser Shanna Fischer Mary Subject RE Sales Tax Payable accrual Patty The MM Sales Tax Accrual was originally recorded to acct We transferred MM in January for the PX Credit Reserve This month Sept we moved MM from this acct to the Bonus Accrual on I dont know the status of the remaining MM left in the Taxes Payable Other acct Todd From Patricia A nronXgate on PM To Sara ES Todd ES cc Todd nronXgate Sally ES Shanna nronXgate Mary nronXgate Subject RE Sales Tax Payable accrual I think we have found the account but it looks like this has been transferred to from Can you provide us with the entries for both companies and let me know when you plan on taking this to the income statement if you plan on doing this Thanks Patty Original Message From Ray Sara Sent Wednesday October PM To Hunter Todd Cc Lee Patricia A Subject Sales Tax Payable accrual Todd Can you please provide Patty with the company and account number where the yearend sales tax accrual is recorded They are going to start making payments against the accrual Is the balance still at the original MM
